level.text: The requirements for obtaining plan approval set forth in ยง1401.1 shall not apply to any of the following activities:
The harvesting of fish, shellfish or crabs;
Any action requiring approval under ยง7 of D.C. Law 5-188, D.C. Code ยง6-926 (1995 Repl. Vol.); or
Recreational boating or angling activities which might incidentally affect submerged aquatic vegetation.
